hero_image.title: Hero image - Infrastruktura techniczna dla biznesu
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja 3D przedstawiająca elementy infrastruktury online - serwery, chmura, dashboard
hero_image.alt_text: 3D kompozycja infrastruktury online - serwery, chmura i dashboard analytics na czystym tle
hero_image.prompt: 3D render composition of modern tech infrastructure elements: floating servers, cloud symbols, laptop with analytics dashboard, minimalist geometric design on light gray gradient background, clean lines, muted colors black white gray with subtle yellow accents, professional tech aesthetic, high quality render, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean minimalist, tech-focused, no people, modern workspace aesthetic

section_media.title: Wykres wpływu szybkości ładowania na konwersje
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy pokazujący spadek konwersji wraz ze wzrostem czasu ładowania strony
section_media.alt_text: Wykres spadku konwersji e-commerce w zależności od czasu ładowania strony od 1 do 5 sekund
section_media.prompt: Clean bar chart showing e-commerce conversion rates vs page loading time, bars decreasing from left to right, 1-5 seconds on x-axis, conversion percentage on y-axis, professional design with black and gray colors, yellow highlight on optimal performance zone, white background

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean professional chart design, could use business infographic template

section_media.section: Podstawy hostingu dla biznesu - Typy hostingu
section_media.title: Porównanie typów hostingu dla biznesu
section_media.description: Tabela porównawcza hosting współdzielony vs VPS vs serwer dedykowany vs cloud
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównania hosting współdzielony VPS serwer dedykowany cloud z cenami i parametrami
section_media.prompt: Professional comparison table showing 4 hosting types: shared, VPS, dedicated, cloud. Clean grid layout with icons, pricing, features comparison, black headers, gray alternating rows, yellow highlights for recommended options, minimalist business design, readable typography

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional table design with clear categorization and visual hierarchy

section_media.section: Cloudflare jako przełom dla Twojej strony
section_media.title: Dashboard Cloudflare - główny widok
section_media.description: Screenshot panelu Cloudflare pokazujący kluczowe metryki bezpieczeństwa i wydajności
section_media.alt_text: Panel Cloudflare z metrykami ruchu, zabezpieczeń i wydajności dla strony e-commerce
section_media.prompt: Clean mockup of Cloudflare dashboard interface showing security metrics, performance analytics, traffic stats, blocked threats counter, modern web UI design, professional software interface with charts and numbers, highlighted security features

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional software interface, clean modern design, focus on metrics and security

section_media.title: Flowchart procesu migracji hostingu
section_media.description: Diagram 12-krokowego procesu migracji hostingu bez przestojów
section_media.alt_text: Diagram procesu migracji hostingu w 12 krokach z backup i testowaniem bez przestojów
section_media.prompt: Vertical flowchart showing 12-step website migration process, numbered circular steps connected by arrows, icons for backup, testing, DNS change, monitoring phases, clean minimalist design with black text, gray connecting lines, yellow highlights for critical steps, professional infographic style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean flowchart design with numbered steps and clear visual hierarchy

section_media.title: Wykres skalowania kosztów hostingu
section_media.description: Wykres liniowy pokazujący wzrost kosztów infrastruktury wraz z rozwojem biznesu
section_media.alt_text: Wykres wzrostu kosztów hostingu od startup przez małą firmę do enterprise
section_media.prompt: Line chart showing hosting costs scaling with business growth, three lines for startup (50 PLN), small business (500 PLN), enterprise (3000 PLN), x-axis shows business stages, y-axis shows monthly costs in PLN, clean design with black lines and yellow accent color

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional financial chart design with clear cost progression visualization

section_media.title: Workspace z planowaniem strategii domenowej
section_media.description: Widok z góry na biurko z notatkami o strategii domenowej i laptopem
section_media.alt_text: Biurko z laptopem, notatkami o strategii domenowej i planowaniem marki online
section_media.prompt: Flat lay view of modern workspace, laptop showing domain registration interface, notebook with handwritten domain strategy notes, yellow pen, coffee cup, smartphone, clean white desk surface, natural window lighting, minimalist composition, professional business aesthetic, muted colors with yellow accent, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: domain planning workspace flat lay laptop
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean flat lay composition, business planning theme, natural lighting, minimal aesthetic
